text: Ara adamera du’chelera kahini apani taderake yathayathabhabe sunana [1]. Yakhana tara ubhaye kurabani karechila atahpara ekajana theke kabula kara hala ebam an'yajanera kabula kara hala na. Se balala, ‘abasya'i ami tomake hatya karaba’ [2]. An'yajana balala, ‘allaha to kebala muttakidera paksa hate kabula karena’
